author: Warhammer
description:
Today’s Anniversary Update brings two new game modes, new maps for the Operations and Eternal War modes, weapons, enemies and more! 

Focus Entertainment and Saber Interactive are excited to announce the release of the Anniversary Update for their blockbuster third-person action game Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2. The gameplay update is available free for all PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC players. Today’s kick-off of Year 2 also marks the release of the game’s Season Pass II, promising new Chapter-inspired cosmetics.  

Check out our Anniversary Update Trailer!

title: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 Anniversary Update Trailer
